name: Awesome-Deep-Learning-Papers-for-Search-Recommendation-Advertising (guyulongcs)
description: [项目级] Awesome Deep Learning papers for industrial Search, Recommendation and Advertisement. They focus on Embedding, Matching, Pre-Ranking, Ranking (CTR/CVR prediction), Post Ranking, Relevance, LLM, Reinforcement Learning and so on.。来源: https://github.com/guyulongcs/Awesome-Deep-Learning-Papers-for-Search-Recommendation-Advertising

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Awesome Deep Learning papers for industrial Search, Recommendation and Advertisement. They focus on Embedding, Matching, Pre-Ranking, Ranking (CTR/CVR prediction), Post Ranking, Relevance, LLM, Reinforcement Learning and so on.

来源: https://github.com/guyulongcs/Awesome-Deep-Learning-Papers-for-Search-Recommendation-Advertising
语言: Python
Stars: 2327

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
00_Embedding
00_Embedding/2013 (Google) (NIPS) [Word2vec] Distributed Representations of Words and Phrases and their Compositionality.pdf
00_Embedding/2014 (KDD) [DeepWalk]  DeepWalk - online learning of social representations.pdf
00_Embedding/2015 (WWW) [LINE] LINE Large-scale Information Network Embedding.pdf
00_Embedding/2016 (KDD) [Node2vec] node2vec - Scalable Feature Learning for Networks.pdf
00_Embedding/2017 (ICLR) [GCN] Semi-supervised Classification with Graph Convolutional Networks .pdf
00_Embedding/2017 (KDD) [Struc2vec] struc2vec - Learning Node Representations from Structural Identity.pdf
00_Embedding/2017 (NIPS) [GraphSAGE] Inductive Representation Learning on Large Graphs.pdf
00_Embedding/2018 (Alibaba) (KDD) *[Alibaba Embedding] Billion-scale Commodity Embedding for E-commerce Recommendation in Alibaba.pdf
00_Embedding/2018 (ICLR) [GAT]  Graph Attention Networks.pdf
00_Embedding/2018 (Pinterest) (KDD) *[PinSage] Graph Convolutional Neural Networks for Web-Scale Recommender Systems.pdf
00_Embedding/2018 (WSDM) [NetMF] Network embedding as matrix factorization - Unifying deepwalk, line, pte, and node2vec.pdf
00_Embedding/2019 (Alibaba) (KDD) *[GATNE] Representation Learning for Attributed Multiplex Heterogeneous Network.pdf
01_Matching
01_Matching/1998 (Microsoft) Empirical Analysis of Predictive Algorithms for Collaborative Filtering.pdf
01_Matching/2003 (Amazon) Amazon.com recommendations - item-to-item collaborative filtering.pdf
01_Matching/2009 (Computer) [MF] Matrix factorization techniques for recommender systems.pdf
01_Matching/2013 (Microsoft) (CIKM) [DSSM] Learning deep structured semantic models for web search using clickthrough data.pdf
01_Matching/2015 (KDD) [Sceptre] Inferring Networks of Substitutable and Complementary Products.pdf
01_Matching/2016 (Google) (RecSys) **[Youtube DNN] Deep Neural Networks for YouTube Recommendations.pdf

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
* [2010 (ICDM) [FM] Factorization machines](https://github.com/guyulongcs/Deep-Learning-for-Search-Recommendation-Advertisements/blob/master/03_Ranking/Feature-Crossing/2010%20%28ICDM%29%20%5BFM%5D%20Factorization%20machines.pdf)

* [2016 (Arxiv) [PNN] Product-based Neural
